### Issue URL (Ads) [https://m.search.naver.com/search.naver?sm=mtb_hty.top&where=m&ssc=tab.m.all&oquery=%EC%9D%B4%EC%B2%9C+%EB%A9%94%EB%A5%B4%ED%97%A4%EB%8D%B4&tqi=iI9E6dqVbxoss4XntBVssssssiw-279072&query=%EC%9D%B4%EC%B2%9C+%ED%85%8C%EB%A5%B4%EB%A9%94%EB%8D%B4](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.search.naver.com%2Fsearch.naver%3Fsm%3Dmtb_hty.top%26where%3Dm%26ssc%3Dtab.m.all%26oquery%3D%25EC%259D%25B4%25EC%25B2%259C%2B%25EB%25A9%2594%25EB%25A5%25B4%25ED%2597%25A4%25EB%258D%25B4%26tqi%3DiI9E6dqVbxoss4XntBVssssssiw-279072%26query%3D%25EC%259D%25B4%25EC%25B2%259C%2B%25ED%2585%258C%25EB%25A5%25B4%25EB%25A9%2594%25EB%258D%25B4) ### Comment > 이전에 제거 했던데 다시 뜨는거 보면 광고 자체가 업데이트 된거 같기도 하고;; 일시적인 제거가 아닌 영구 제거 부탁드립니다. 해당광고도 동일하게 ublock에서는 안뜹니다. ### Screenshots

issue.title: pahe.plus

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.8.42

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://pahe.plus/tETADK

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

fake download button and cookie notice

### Privacy
